673f06ffd971eef67d8cc504 description: You there. Dog, Hand over your cash! Don't even try anything smart. Drop it- Hold on a second. Let me see your face... Ahh, the tales were right after all. For you to be the chosen one, for you to be the one who escapes... But for that, you'll need my assistance. I require a GPhone to be found in combat; make sure they are not used up. I'll reward you handsomely. Follow my guidance, and you shall reveal the true secrets that are being held underneath this very ground — the ground of Tarkov.
673f06ffd971eef67d8cc504 startedMessageT: You there. Dog, Hand over your cash! Don't even try anything smart. Drop it- Hold on a second. Let me see your face... Ahh, the tales were right after all. I'll reward you handsomely. Follow my guidance, and you shall reveal the true secrets that are being held underneath this very ground — the ground of Tarkov.
673f06ffd971eef67d8cc504 successMessageT: Well done. Stay alive till then, as we shall meet again.

673f0668cb0fd5b0d77c4b59: Hand over your Broken GPhone (Found in Raid)
6740b1c44382955ae7e87eb9 description: Feel like expanding your wardrobe huh? Want to feel a little bit more special and decorate your gear? I got you.. Hand me the following items - I'll make sure to put them into good use.
6740b1c44382955ae7e87eb9 startedMessageT: Feel like expanding your wardrobe huh? Want to feel a little bit more special and decorate your gear? I got you.. Hand me the following items - I'll make sure to put them into good use.
6740af41aa8bee3a7805c6e2: Obtain and hand over 2 Ripstop fabric Found In Raid
6740af6f51efb9b5d04871bc: Obtain and hand over 2 Fleece fabric Found In Raid
6740af8645d7d713fa85f3c4: Obtain and hand over 2 Aramid fiber fabric Found In Raid
6740af98b7502f1bee19aa40: Obtain and hand over a Sewing Kit Found In Raid
6740afa6ffeb863481fbeaba: Locate and Eliminate 3 Scavs around Interchange
673f0b6c85753ffd03ad5f34 description: Greetings, Operator. My name does not matter at this time and place. You're looking to help for the cause? or be a part of it? Eliminate three Rogues around the streets. Make sure you wipe them clean, they are threats to our realm's balance. Acquire five Cans of Hot Rod Energy Drinks, and our destinies may align. Be cautious, for trust is a rare gem in these shadows. May darkness shield you on this enigmatic journey.
673f0b6c85753ffd03ad5f34 startedMessageT: Time is of the essence, Operator! The shadows grow longer, and the Rogue Military Assets plot their sinister schemes. Swiftly now, eliminate those threats and bring me the Energy Drinks before the sun sets. The stakes are high, and our enemies won't wait for your leisure. The dark currents of the black market are restless, and every moment counts. Sharpen your resolve, move with purpose, and may your actions be as swift as a serpent's strike. The realm's fate hangs in the balance, and it's in your hands to tip it in our favor. Hurry, for the night waits for no one, and the clandestine hour draws near.
673f0b6c85753ffd03ad5f34 successMessageT: Well done, Operator! Your capabilities shine in the dark corners. Your talents intrigue me, and I'm eager to explore more opportunities together. Come back, and let's delve deeper into the realm of the black market. Exciting ventures await your keen senses.
673f0b6c85753ffd03ad5f34 completePlayerM: Well done, Operator! Your capabilities shine in the dark corners. Your talents intrigue me, and I'm eager to explore more opportunities together. Come back, and let's delve deeper into the realm of the black market. Exciting ventures await your keen senses.
673f0a2b5b3e79f8600e5276: Locate and Eliminate 3 Rogues around Tarkov District
673f0a4ce5cea974b21a2a05: Obtain and hand over 4 Cans of Hot Rod energy drink
673f0daebb711e9700b60899 description: Operator, a new threat emerges—undercover agents of Terragroup, disguised as Shturman's guards, haunt the woods with treachery. They used the USEC Camp as their storage area so I would need you to go and confirm the location. Remain vigilant and cautious, as they blend seamlessly into the shadows, masking their true intentions. Unravel this covert web to secure the realm's safety and advance our collaboration. Trust your instincts, and may the shadows be your ally in this perilous pursuit.
673f0daebb711e9700b60899 startedMessageT: Operator, a new threat emerges—undercover agents of Terragroup, disguised as Shturman's guards, haunt the woods with treachery. They used the USEC Camp as their storage area so I would need you to go and confirm the location. Remain vigilant and cautious, as they blend seamlessly into the shadows, masking their true intentions. Unravel this covert web to secure the realm's safety and advance our collaboration. Trust your instincts, and may the shadows be your ally in this perilous pursuit.
673f0daebb711e9700b60899 successMessageT: Operator, Your dedication and skills are truly impressive. Congratulations on your remarkable achievements! Keep up the excellent work! Now, the realm faces a new challenge: two rogue cultists have emerged, threatening the peace. They must be dealt with swiftly and decisively. Trust in your abilities, for the realm relies on your strength once more. Good luck, and may success be with you on this critical mission

Remain vigilant and cautious, as they blend seamlessly into the shadows, masking their true intentions. Unravel this covert web to secure the realm's safety and advance our collaboration. Trust your instincts, and may the shadows be your ally in this perilous pursuit.

Trust in your abilities, for the realm relies on your strength once more. Good luck, and may success be with you on this critical mission
673f0ca2de2bbb23be861666: Locate and Eliminate 5 Undercover Terragroup Agents in Woods.
673f0cbf2421ebcacf3c0c31: Handover 3 CMS Surgical Kits Found in Raid
673f0ccfa0f84cd48639d353: Locate the Abandoned USEC Camp in Woods.
673f0f4d219756e158de7ab3 description: Operator, allow me to introduce you to the 'Predator,' a figure forged in the crucible of adversity. Emerging from a life of captivity, they endured unthinkable cruelty, treated as a mere dog with a twisted corrugated hose used as a leash. Hand over the requested items to gain Prapor's loyalty, my way of expressing gratitude for aiding my friend. Retrieve the lost Collar that once served as the leash around the Predator's neck. Fetch it.
673f0f4d219756e158de7ab3 startedMessageT: With haste Operator. For theres no time to waste. Gain his loyalty and come back for your reward.
673f0f4d219756e158de7ab3 successMessageT: Impressive work, Operator. Prapor and I are thoroughly content with your actions and skills. Our paths will cross again. Stay vigilant until then.
673f0f4d219756e158de7ab3 completePlayerM: Impressive work, Operator. Prapor and I are thoroughly content with your actions and skills. Our paths will cross again. Stay vigilant until then.
6740b5875ef4d62a019c51f2 description: Operator, I'm glad to see you again. I was required to test your skills and guidance under conditions that do not matter at this time of conversation but will be needed in the future. Listen carefully — you should be wearing a skull mask in order to strike fear into our enemies and use a suppressed weapon to keep you in the shadows. With haste, operator, as time is a valuable thing.
6740b5875ef4d62a019c51f2 startedMessageT: perator, I'm glad to see you again. I was required to test your skills and guidance under conditions that do not matter at this time of conversation but will be needed in the future. Listen carefully — you should be wearing a skull mask in order to strike fear into our enemies and use a suppressed weapon to keep you in the shadows. With haste, operator, as time is a valuable thing.
6740b5875ef4d62a019c51f2 successMessageT: Operator! Well done! Its time for you to rest and await the next call. Stay in touch.
6740b5875ef4d62a019c51f2 acceptPlayerMes: With haste Operator. For theres no time to waste. Fetch the dogs and hunt them down, Leave no one alive.
6740b5875ef4d62a019c51f2 completePlayerM: Operator! Well done! Its time for you to rest and await the next call. Stay in touch.
6740b3671916a668a4416b64: Eliminate 10 Scavs using a Suppressed Weapon and wearing the Skull Mask on Shoreline
6740b3f6bebbc247c1c2bbde: Eliminate 6 Scavs Between the time period of 21:00 - 04:00 on Shoreline
6740b70d0c2f488b92d69575 description: Operator, I come bearing news of the Predators recent operation at Customs. Find me the wagon used by the 'Predator' to sneak into Customs. He did some dirty work around the area.. So bad that one of the bosses arrived into town - 'Reshala' is his name. Anyways.. Go and give him some Rations. 3 Water Bottles and 2 MREs should be enough for this bastard.. Good luck.
6740b70d0c2f488b92d69575 startedMessageT: Operator, I come bearing news of the Predators recent operation at Customs. Find me the wagon used by the 'Predator' to sneak into Customs. 6740b70d0c2f488b92d69575 completePlayerM: Very well Operator. I hope our paths cross again. Stay vigilant until then.

6740b64a4ecf20026c9bc562: Place 3 Water Bottles in the train Wagon
6740b66b5755c252346803f0: Place 2 MRE Ration pack in the train Wagon
6741d2a8ee39dbd555b6468d description: Operator, there have been some rumours around me including couple ex-cultists that have been under my command. I need you to find and hunt them. They know too much to let someone capture the.. Even though our tongues have been binded by 'The Blade'. I still have my worries they will bark like dogs at the right moment in the wrong place.. Fetch them Operator.
6741d2a8ee39dbd555b6468d startedMessageT: Operator, there have been some rumours around me including couple ex-cultists that have been under my command. I need you to find and hunt them. Fetch them Operator.
6741d2a8ee39dbd555b6468d successMessageT: Very well, Operator. Rest assured, your actions won't go unnoticed. You have earned not only my trust but also the trust of the entire team.
6741d2a8ee39dbd555b6468d completePlayerM: Very well, Operator. Rest assured, your actions won't go unnoticed. You have earned not only my trust but also the trust of the entire team.
6741cfb9b4e9db7012b95bb9: Eliminate 4 Rogue Cultist Warriors Between the time period of 21:00 - 04:00 on Customs

6741d1b37b308fe38323970b: Eliminate 2 Rogue Cultist Priests the time period of 21:00 - 04:00 on Shoreline
6741d50ae7f5bd50d5034129 description: Operator, I'm glad you came along. Sit down. I'm letting you in on a little secret that stays between the two of us. You know those greenhouses in Shoreline? That's where that son of a bitch 'Sanitar' is, with his cowardly group of men-lovers scattered around. Ahh nevermind, just get me the requested items. I'm going to plant some surveillance around his area. He thinks he's safe and I don't like that.
6741d50ae7f5bd50d5034129 startedMessageT: Operator, I'm glad you came along. Sit down. I'm letting you in on a little secret that stays between the two of us. You know those greenhouses in Shoreline? That's where that son of a bitch 'Sanitar' is, with his cowardly group of men-lovers scattered around. Ahh nevermind, just get me the requested items. I'm going to plant some surveillance around his area. He thinks he's safe and I don't like that.
6741d50ae7f5bd50d5034129 successMessageT: Very well, Operator. Let's examine what the 'bird retrieved from the wormhole.'
6741d50ae7f5bd50d5034129 acceptPlayerMes: Operator, thank you for coming again. This time, I need you to obtain some surveillance devices. I'm going to conduct some surveillance.
6741d50ae7f5bd50d5034129 completePlayerM: Very well, Operator. Let's examine what the 'bird retrieved from the wormhole.'
6741d4569c853f4f43afa91b: Hand-over 2 Intelligence Folder Found in Raid
6741d467700ad453e74c149c: Hand-over 3 Secure Flash Drives Found in Raid
6741d6176c4b417a408d290f description: Operator, that son of a bitch slipped and made it through my attack. I can't afford to let him escape; he possesses crucial information. Consider this: a mere janitor with his own laboratory room in a top-secret area? It's absurd. There's more to this situation than meets the eye. He's holding something I need, something of immense value to our operation. I need you to track him down, capture him, and bring him back. We can't let him out of our sight. This mission could be the key to unraveling the secrets he holds, secrets that could change the course of our entire operation.
6741d6176c4b417a408d290f startedMessageT: Operator, that son of a bitch slipped and made it through my attack. I can't afford to let him escape; he possesses crucial information. Consider this: a mere janitor with his own laboratory room in a top-secret area? It's absurd. There's more to this situation than meets the eye. He's holding something I need, something of immense value to our operation. I need you to track him down, capture him, and bring him back. We can't let him out of our sight. This mission could be the key to unraveling the secrets he holds, secrets that could change the course of our entire operation.
6741d6176c4b417a408d290f successMessageT: Operator, you're a goddamn beast! You tore that son of a bitch apart. It's time to snatch back what's rightfully ours - all the damn medical gear, computers, and hardware scattered around that shithole cottage area. Screw that bastard and his lapdog, Therapist.
6741d6176c4b417a408d290f acceptPlayerMes: Operator, I've got some good news and bad news. Which one should I start with? Bad news first: Sanitar has fled. We managed to capture some of his guards, and they let it slip that he's supposed to return to the cottage area. The good news is that you're going to eliminate that son of a bitch.
6741d74a7ca8a4abfdf908c6 description: Operator, great news. Word has spread around Tarkov District that you've eliminated Sanitar, and as a result, his rats have started to dig out his stashes. That's an opportunity to hunt what is rightfully ours. He left an untouched package in a Lighthouse Villa. I've heard they made a final attempt to save that motherfucker. Go ahead and mark it; I'll send some of my boys at night. Another small request: I've been told his goons who were with him are confirmed dead. I want to confirm that one last time. Head to the scav outpost at Woods; there should be a white cargo filled with body bags. Confirm it for me.
6741d74a7ca8a4abfdf908c6 startedMessageT: Operator, great news. Word has spread around Tarkov District that you've eliminated Sanitar, and as a result, his rats have started to dig out his stashes. That's an opportunity to hunt what is rightfully ours. He left an untouched package in a Lighthouse Villa. I've heard they made a final attempt to save that motherfucker. Go ahead and mark it; I'll send some of my boys at night. Another small request: I've been told his goons who were with him are confirmed dead. I want to confirm that one last time. Head to the scav outpost at Woods; there should be a white cargo filled with body bags. Confirm it for me.
6741d74a7ca8a4abfdf908c6 successMessageT: Very well Operator. I shall inform the others. For now, wait for another call.
6741d74a7ca8a4abfdf908c6 acceptPlayerMes: Operator, great news. Word has spread around Tarkov District that you've eliminated Sanitar, and as a result, his rats have started to dig out his stashes.
6741d68295ef994417d1dce9: Locate the medical room in the Chalet Villa on Lighthouse
6741d6b2ddfdda359567cf38: Locate the cargo filled with dead bodies of Sanitars men in Woods
6741d86720827d719dafa146 description: Operator, word is spreading that the bloodhounds, led by a certain 'Den' and his scav companion 'Ryzhy,' have infiltrated the Tarkov district. They've garnered quite a reputation among the locals. Jaeger contacted me, expressing concern about the Bloodhounds' release from the Arena, anticipating chaos that needs to be quelled. We're tasked with sending a message by eliminating three of the Bloodhounds as a warning, but be cautious not to harm Den; he holds a close connection to Jaeger. And could be helpful in the near future..
6741d86720827d719dafa146 startedMessageT: Operator, word is spreading that the bloodhounds, led by a certain 'Den' and his scav companion 'Ryzhy,' have infiltrated the Tarkov district. And could be helpful in the near future..
6741d86720827d719dafa146 successMessageT: Well done, Operator. Once again, you haven't disappointed me. Stay in touch; I shall send you a message soon enough. Keep your eyes open. Den should return to Jaeger any minute now.

6741da44d68092ca9722521a description: Welcome back—oh, you seem really off. Bloodhounds didn't treat you well, did they? Sit; you need to get some rest. I'll make you a great medicine, one of a kind. Just make sur- agh. I ran out of materials. Well, Operator, get some rest, then head back to obtain the materials..

6741d9b13ffb6d639c02c353: Handover 2 Bottle of hydrogen peroxide Found in Raid
6741dbba9e6d28c8ff0a700f description: Pal, let me tell you about our little adventure ahead of us. Our mission of sending a message to the Bloodhounds has successfully impacted the group. They've know you for your deeds and connections, yet undervalue your actions and skills. Den and Ryzhy came back to Jaeger's hideout and explained the situation. There was a setup in a deal conducted between a group of rogue PMCs; they played dirty tricks on Bloodhound's dealer men. That's why they made their arrival at our locations. We've been tasked with finding out what the deal was about, as Den wasn't telling too much. But I believe the deal was for a certain keycard, a keycard related to Terragroup's doings. I want you to go and look after that. Bring me an entrance keycard to their facility.
6741dbba9e6d28c8ff0a700f startedMessageT: Pal, let me tell you about our little adventure ahead of us. Our mission of sending a message to the Bloodhounds has successfully impacted the group. I want you to go and look after that. Bring me an entrance keycard to their facility.
6741dbba9e6d28c8ff0a700f successMessageT: Well done! Once again, you haven't disappointed me. Stay in touch; I shall send you a message soon enough. Keep your eyes open.

6741db339f68236cae98f963: Handover a TerraGroup Labs access keycard
6741dd080a4b6768df84d4ed description: Listen up, pal. I've got some grim news about those bloodhounds wreaking havoc in our district. They've pulled off a daring ambush on a Terragroup Jeep as it navigated the streets of Customs. I've got intel from the Predator on the sensitive documents stashed in that jeep and where it was bound. Also, there has been rumours going around the recent Van made it safely to the factories in Customs and dispatched a set of barrels onto one of the abandoned factories.. It is still unknown what liquid is filled within those barrels but its up to you to find out. Head there too and mark it for me. Let me tell you, there's always a more ominous force at play. Aid me in tracking down that jeep and barrels. - I'll dispatch my crew to tear apart every inch of the vicinity, extracting whatever they can. Thank you Operator.

Use caution when entering and get rid of any informatns so they won't be able to pass the information of your arrival. It seems there's an abandoned Medical Tent near one of the exits. I need you to grab a sample and mark the Hazmat suit, as there are remains of the unknown liquid similar to what has been found inside those barrels. Also, mark the medical boxes. I'll send my men to retrieve the materials.

6745faad87494344ac6986e7 description: Pal, heed this: the Predator has whispered of the cultists' return to the shadows of Tarkov. My men, they've fallen victim to these enigmatic foes, their gear now lost to the abyss. It falls upon you to reclaim what's rightfully ours. There will be ample compensation for your efforts. This task is pivotal, for within that equipment lies the key to our preparations, our clandestine endeavors. Fetch it, and the mysteries of our cause shall unfold.
6745faad87494344ac6986e7 startedMessageT: Pal, heed this: the Predator has whispered of the cultists' return to the shadows of Tarkov. My men, they've fallen victim to these enigmatic foes, their gear now lost to the abyss. It falls upon you to reclaim what's rightfully ours. There will be ample compensation for your efforts. This task is pivotal, for within that equipment lies the key to our preparations, our clandestine endeavors. Fetch it, and the mysteries of our cause shall unfold.

6745faad87494344ac6986e7 completePlayerM: Well done! Once again, you haven't disappointed me. Stay in touch; I shall send you a message soon enough. Keep your eyes open.
6745f9274036600d8ce9076d: Hand over 1 Gas welder safety goggles Found in Raid
6745f92f7f5b0504ec340c65: Hand over 1 Cultist Knife Found in Raid
6745fdae9426c1e4a9fd5772 description: Dear friend, leaving you this note as we head out to gather resources. Once again, I require your assistance. My comrades and I are preparing to assault the remaining Terragroup assets. While armed, our current arsenal falls short. I kindly request your aid in acquiring 3 M4A1s, 2 AKMs, and ample ammunition. Perhaps you could approach the traders; they might be aware of our plans and willing to help. Your support is invaluable. Thank you, Artem.

67462d52d129aa9ebc6eb98d description: Friend, our raid went off without a hitch, The Terragroup Building was swarming with targets, but they scattered like insects at the first sign of trouble. However, something peculiar caught my attention inside. Behind a locked door, a familiar sound echoed—an enigma I couldn't unravel. I attempted to breach the door, aiming for the hinges, but to no avail. There's definitely something unusual happening behind that barrier. I consulted a buddy skilled in the art of locks. He mentioned a key—known mysteriously as the something 'meeting room key'—that grants access. Find this key. The room lies within the TerraGroup security post building at 'Streets of Tarkov'. Discover what secrets await inside.
67462d52d129aa9ebc6eb98d startedMessageT: Friend, our raid went off without a hitch, The Terragroup Building was swarming with targets, but they scattered like insects at the first sign of trouble. Discover what secrets await inside.
67462d52d129aa9ebc6eb98d successMessageT: Blue screen, you say...? That sounds like the E.M.P. attack, You might know it as the 'Blue Fire' incident. I'll send some of my men to retrieve any media from it and keep you updated.

67462c0a7462aee80c07878e: Locate and find out whats behind the locked door
67463059a075ba4f50c0e396 description: Friend, My crew found out two things - 1.Dennis has become entangled in this. It suggests we're onto something serious. He shared details about those mysterious blue tapes you witnessed playing in the meeting room. It seems they're preparing for another E.M.P. attack on the District, but there's a crucial missing piece to this puzzle that eludes us. 2.I've also received word about members of my former crew lurking in the shadows of Customs warehouses, perhaps even collaborating with the Goons at the Fortress. Head there under the cover of night, and take these with you.
67463059a075ba4f50c0e396 startedMessageT: Friend, My crew found out two things - 1.Dennis has become entangled in this. It suggests we're onto something serious. 67463059a075ba4f50c0e396 successMessageT: So they really are preparing for yet another E.M.P. attack. Those bastards were after the missing barrels in Customs, the ones you marked before. We have to find out what kind of fluids these barrels contain. Friend, you've exceeded my expectations yet again. I'll send someone to contact you.

6746319d051c463a810728fc description: Friend, it's time for you to visit the Lab where my last crew unfortunately didn't make it on their final journey there, but we did retrieve some valuable information related to our operation, as just before their exit, Vladimir spotted an unknown material spilled all over the yellow tent but had no means of analyzing the liquid or goo, so you'll need to equip a 'Gaz Analyzer' and investigate this; they also discovered a laptop emitting similar signals to the one Sanitar had in his wardrobe, behind a locked door, with the crew mentioning a glassed meeting room, and that's where our conversation ended, so pick up your gear, prepare, and retrieve the information, Friend!
6746319d051c463a810728fc startedMessageT: Friend, it's time for you to visit the Lab where my last crew unfortunately didn't make it on their final journey there, but we did retrieve some valuable information related to our operation, as just before their exit, Vladimir spotted an unknown material spilled all over the yellow tent but had no means of analyzing the liquid or goo, so you'll need to equip a 'Gaz Analyzer' and investigate this; they also discovered a laptop emitting similar signals to the one Sanitar had in his wardrobe, behind a locked door, with the crew mentioning a glassed meeting room, and that's where our conversation ended, so pick up your gear, prepare, and retrieve the information, Friend!
6746319d051c463a810728fc successMessageT: I was right all along.. These sons of bitches were preparing an assault on the entire district once again... This one could be dangerous than we think my Friend.. lay low till we meet again.

6746310e33b395c9d5e8c134: Mark the Laptop that was left behind in the locked office
67464750efd379bfffb1d539 description: Friend, it's time to hit Terragroup back, but we gotta hit hard. Sergey (Mechanic) and I developed a stable and more efficient version of the old 'USB Rubber Ducky.' On your journey in Labs, you most likely have stumbled upon the numerous server racks scattered around the establishment. I want you to plug it in and install all the data you can. We need this valuable information for our assault on Terragroup. And last but not least, head over to Sanitar's workplace; you should be able to find more valuable information about his connections with Elvira. Be careful upon exiting the establishment to avoid getting shot, as it's heavily patrolled by Raiders and PMCs.

67464750efd379bfffb1d539 successMessageT: Impressive work. Sergey decrypted the flash drives and found a particular file called - 'False Prophets'.. I'll gather some more intel and will contact you shortly. You did very well, my friend, and showed great loyalty to me. Till then, lay low.

674652a3507f4bb1aecd1086 description: Buddy, glad to meet you once again. Sit down. Sergey discovered some information about two of the so-called 'False Prophets.' It seems they are just men who hold enough power to influence some weak-minded people, winning their trust with mere charisma. One of these guys used to work as a janitor at Chemical Plant No. 16, or as you may already know it, Factory. Their full name is unknown, but they go by the nicknames 'Tagilla and 'Killa', Two powerful figures here in Tarkov. Locate and Interrogate them in order reveal the next location for our 'False Prophet'
